List of Immigrants per ship : St Hilda

Arrived on the thirtieth day of January 1865

  • Laverty Michael 30
  • Sarah 28
  • Dennis 5
  • Catherine 3
  • Sarah

The ship “Saint Hilda” landed at Port Jackson on 4.2.1865.
